pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pissandshittium is a privacy-focused fork of Chromium. This browser aims to provide enhanced privacy features while maintaining compatibility with the Chromium ecosystem.

use.flag: Build as separate components for faster development builds
Use bundled libc++ instead of system libstdc++
Build with official optimizations (slower build, faster runtime)
Enable screen casting support via PipeWire
Use system toolchain instead of bundled
Enable Widevine CDM for DRM content
